korean: 가을이 와서 길거리 나뭇잎이 예쁘게 물들었다.
빨강, 노랑, 주황색 단풍이 정말 예쁘더라.
사람들이 다 사진 찍느라 바쁘길래 나도 몇 장 찍었어.
날씨도 선선하고 하늘도 맑아서 기분이 좋았다.
바람 살랑 불어서 나뭇잎들이 우수수 떨어지는 게 운치있었어.
벤치에 앉아서 한참 멍 때리면서 쉬었다.
근처 카페에서 아메리카노 사서 마시면서 책 읽었어.
가을이 제일 좋은 계절인 것 같다.
english: Fall has arrived and the leaves on the streets have turned beautiful colors.
The red, yellow, and orange foliage was, like, really pretty.
I walked in the park and enjoyed the autumn foliage.
Everyone was busy taking photos, so I snapped a few too.
The weather was cool and the sky was clear, so I felt good.
The breeze was gently blowing and leaves were falling down, which was kind of poetic.
I sat on a bench and just zoned out for a while.
I grabbed an americano from a nearby cafe and read a book.
It's been forever since I had this kind of leisurely time.
I think fall is the best season.
It's not too hot, not too cold—just perfect.
I should come here again next fall.
